aboutProject.heading: Nezve Project
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Tembere inyanzvi uye setiraiti ine chinangwa chekuve temberi inosanganisirwa zvakanyanya, yakavakwa pasina madziro anogona kusvika. Yakagadzirwa nemuimbi wekuBrazil Edson Pavoni, muimbi ari kuseri kweInumeráveis Memorial yakasvika munhu mumwe chete muvatanhatu veBrazil panguva yedenda reCOVID, chirongwa ichi chinokoka vanhu kubva pasirese kuti vatumire zita remunhu wavanoda kuyeuka. Aya mazita anoendeswa kune satellite mu orbit, achigadzira chiyeuchidzo chakaungana.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Kuburikidza newebhusaiti inowanikwa mumitauro 136, vatori vechikamu vanopinda murudzi rutsva rwetsika. Temberi yeOrbital inoongorora madingindira ekubatanidzwa, ndangariro, uye hunhu hwedu hwakagovaniswa, vachibvunza kuti sei pasina temberi chaiyo paPasi inogona kugamuchira munhu wese zvechokwadi, uye ichikurudzira nzvimbo senzvimbo chete inogona kuve nekubatanidzwa kwakanyanya.

aboutArtist.heading: About the Artist
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni muimbi wekuBrazil ane rwendo rwakatanga mumigwagwa yeSão Paulo, uko mamiriro ehurombo nemhirizhonga akaumba makore ake ekutanga. Munyika umo chiKristu chinopa nzira iri kure nemigwagwa, zvinodhaka, uye chisimba, Pavoni akawana utiziro mukutenda, dingindira iro gare gare, apo akava mutsoropodzi wokubatwa zvisina kufanira kworudzidziso, kuzivisa muitiro wake wounyanzvi.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Muna 2020, panguva yeCCIDID-19 denda, Pavoni akagadzira Inumeráveis (isingaverengeki) , mufananidzo uri pamharadzano yehunyanzvi uye kutapa nhau. Chirongwa ichi chakabvunzurudza zviuru zvemhuri ndokunyora nyaya dzeavo vakarasikirwa nedenda, vachigadzira nzvimbo iyo ndangariro dzaipfuura nhamba nenhamba. Nhetembo, nziyo, uye masifoni akaitwa nenyaya idzodzo. Mapepanhau akagadzira mapepa achishandisa mazita nenhoroondo. Nyeredzi dzese dzeBrazil dzakaita saOscar kuhwina Fernanda Torres, uye nyeredzi dzakaita Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo naLazaro Ramos, uye nevamwe vazhinji vanoverenga nyaya idzodzo paterevhizheni yenyika. Basa racho rakasvika kuvanhu vane mamiriyoni e32, mumwe muvakuru vana vokuBrazil. Yakava network yekuporesa, chiyeuchidzo chemundangariro.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Pashure pekurukurirano dzinopfuura zviuru gumi neshungu, muenzaniso wakavapo: patinotaura nezvomumwe munhu afa, tinosarudza zvidimbu zvenhau yavo sokunge kuti tiri kunyora tsamba yerumbidzo kumuchengeti wesuo reparadhiso. Tinoita zvese zvatinogona kuti tivatumire kune zvatinotenda kuti denga. Iri basa rakamutsa kunzwisisa kutsva: Zvatinotenda pamusoro pekuti ndiani anofanirwa nedenga zvinoumba zvakananga watinogamuchira kana kusabvisa Panyika. Vagari vechiPutukezi muBrazil vaitenda kuti vanhu vatema vakanga vasina mweya; kutenda ikoko kwairuramisa uranda. Kana waive chizvarwa, kana wakazvarirwa panzvimbo isiri iyo kana kuti wakada munhu asiri iye, uchiri, nanhasi uno, uchiudzwa kuti mikova yedenga yakavharwa kwauri. Pane muono weramangwana usina kuzadzwa nekurambwa here?

pressCoverage.heading: Inoratidzirwa Mu / Press Coverage
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Vhidhiyo yekuvhara uye maficha achawedzerwa pavanenge vachiwanikwa. Kuti uwane zvigadziriso zvazvino, ndapota taura neboka redu revatori venhau.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Zviratidziro zvakapfuura uye maficha zvinosanganisira mharidzo pa13th Mercosul Bienal, kucherechedzwa kubva kuLumen Prize, uye kusarudzwa neBrazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
